'''Floral Coupon''' is an event currency for the [[Windblume's Breath]] event. They can be earned as a reward from the [[Windblume's Breath/Breezy Snapshots|Breezy Snapshots challenges]] and can be spent in the [[Windblume's Breath#Festive Ticket|Event Shop]] for valuable rewards.
